website_summaries.verdict: Authentic riding boot in supple leather.
pros: Well-made with a super comfortable footbed
Stylish looks that go with jeans or dresses
cons: Hidden elastic in calf area, but some still found them too baggy

customer_reviews.title: These boots could be super cute except for the huge calf
customer_reviews.text: These boots could be super cute except for the huge calf. At first I thought I had mistakenly ordered the wide calf boot but based on other reviews this is an issue with the regular size. Just don't like the gap-- more of a rain boot look.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stoneman

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Boots ( but too wide in calf area)
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for boots that's somewhat flat heeled (or close to it). I needed boots that are round and have enough space to fit in my orthotics. This may not be the most stylish/ sexy boots that I'm used to, but this is good enough. Clarks brand is always comfortable. When you have foot issues, comfort is more important than style. I gave this 4 stars because it is too wide around the calf even though width is M.
customer_reviews.author: Shopgirl411

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable but some downsides.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for comfort. These boots are very comfortable. I've only worn them once. The cons are that they are a bit snug, but not too small for me since I am between sizes anyway. Maybe they will stretch out. The leather is soft and supple but thin so I suspect they may not last. Time will tell. Also the opening at the top is somewhat gaping and I have athletic legs. I am only keeping them bc they are so comfortable and ca not find any other brown boots that I like in this shade.
customer_reviews.author: Stellarmama

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Attractive!  The best combination.
customer_reviews.text: Clarks products of which I am a HUGE fan are comfortable and attractive. These boots are unusual in that the back panel is not of the same material as the rest of the boot. Thus, there is a contrast that I find aesthetically appealing. The foot bed is comfortable for walking. Many compliments thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Bowzers of ONE

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I just received these boots and so far, I am very satisfied. I just tried them on and they feel comfortable. They fit perfect. I bought a 9.5 M. Even though I have wide feet and large calves, I did have to go with the Wide size. I like rounded boots tall boots but I always have trouble finding something not too tight on my calves and comfortable. These are just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Footbed is Great, Shaft is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots and really wanted to be able to keep them, but couldn't. The footbed felt great, but the shaft was WAY too big. I first thought I must have been sent the wide calf version by mistake, but that wasn't the case. No way will these work for someone with slim calves. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty boot
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well and are comfortable to walk all day. I have worn them twice. The elastic inset is my only concern. I have never had a pair with that type of inset in the calf. My concern is whether or not it will stretch over time and if it will wear as well as a full leather sides/ uppers.
customer_reviews.author: Soprano#2

customer_reviews.title: Quality footwear and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Super comfortable and stylish without being too flashy like some black boots. Good quality product. Only complaint is that the soles don't really have a tread (which is the case with most Clarks), and so in snow, ice, or mud you may lose your footing.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice stretchy material sewn in
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Plenty of calf room. I usually take a normal calf width in most boots and have plenty of room with these. Nice stretchy material sewn in. Very cute, comfortable, and high quality. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K.K.

customer_reviews.title: 20" calf measurement!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I generally LOVE Clarks boots and I was so happy that I came across these....however when I received them, before I even tried them on, I could see the calf was HUGE, my calves are on the larger size but the calves on these boots were GIGANTIC, it was almost comical, when I tried them on I was actually able to fit my entire arm in them and still have room! The calf measurement on the size 8.5 that I received was 20", these boots are on their way back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I received these as a gift and I wear them all the time. They fit perfectly and they look great! I love that the boot top fits my calf and that the boots are so comfortable. the leather is nice and the style is great. Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.author: P. E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the wide width and they are perfect. This boot runs extremely wide in the calf ...
customer_reviews.text: While normally I wear a 9 medium, I ordered the wide width and they are perfect. This boot runs extremely wide in the calf even though I ordered the regular calf. I can work with that as they are a beautiful leather boot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Nice hidden elastic around calf for fit
customer_reviews.text: Live these boots...well made...a nice elastic band disguised to go around the calf where I need it. Not many fit my calf and these 8's do. They are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: AZC

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These boots are better than I expected- soft, high quality leather, super comfy and very fashionable. Perfect to wear with skinny jeans or with a skirt.
customer_reviews.author: AMRecker

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Originally rated these boots 5 stars, but after about 5 months the zipper broke one one of the boots and I couldn't fix it or get customer support. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow for me
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of the boots, but they were just too narrow for my foot. I have another pair of Clark’s (different style) which I love. I thought that these would fit me being Clark’s, but they didn’t. (Only reason for 3 stars)
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots were comfortable right out of the box. They fit well, they look good, and they feel cushiony on my feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: nerak

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the boots are really nice but thought that the opening was too wide. Was looking for something more fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: Love them. A little large at the calf, but not terrible. I'm wearing them right now!
customer_reviews.author: rjones651

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and stylish! I absolutely love them. Great with jeans, leggings, or skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Andi G.

customer_reviews.title: Boot was constructed poorly.
customer_reviews.text: Boots were comfortable and stylish, however the upper part of boot leather was pieced together (not stitched, but glued down). I don't think it would have held up so I returned the boots.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Fit was as expected and the quality has been good so far. The shaft of the boot is a bit snug and my legs are pretty average. Otherwise its a great boot and I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: M. POOCH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots feel comfortable right out of the box. The footbed is soft and yet supportive.
customer_reviews.author: chrisluce

customer_reviews.title: Great boot!
customer_reviews.text: Great boot, looks classy yet has good tread for the weather. I have a 16 inch calves and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Tucker

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these boots
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these boots!I didn't want a wide calf boot, but was worried a regular would be too tight. With the stretch gusset, these fit and look great. They're extremely comfortable and are well made.
customer_reviews.author: crusader93

customer_reviews.title: Was really sad because I loved how they looked
customer_reviews.text: zipper broke after about 10 wears. Was really sad because I loved how they looked.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla J

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and comfortable the first time they were worn
customer_reviews.text: No "wearing them in". Fit perfectly and comfortable the first time they were worn. Clarks might not always be the prettiest - but always the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: G M STARLINGS

customer_reviews.title: They are great plenty of room for thick socks if needed
customer_reviews.text: They are great plenty of room for thick socks if needed. I wear. 71/2 but always order 8 in boots fit perfect, wore them right out of the box all over Europe
customer_reviews.author: Eve S.

customer_reviews.title: look and feel cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: These look and feel cheap. Not good quality leather.. Look like plastic. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra J Watson

customer_reviews.title: Clarks always fits , but not this pair of boots.
customer_reviews.text: Was way too small. Wore a 7 1/2 all my life but couldn't get my foot in boot.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Griner

customer_reviews.title: The boots are a good quality but the calf area is too large and ...
customer_reviews.text: The boots are a good quality but the calf area is too large and it ended up looking like rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself fit as expected but the shaft of the boot was way too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gage

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Comfy and fashionable! Got lots of compliments at work! :)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these boots for over $100. When I received them, the left boot was considerably larger in the calf than the right boot. Very noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit great in the toe since my toes are more square.
customer_reviews.author: SusiQ

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to my fall and winter wardrobe. Can never go wrong with Clarks quality, style and fit!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Dhayer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and looks
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my daughter in law. She is very happy with these boots
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Frey

customer_reviews.title: Love these, they felt great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they felt great out of the box, I have worn them all week long and they have become my new favorite boot!
customer_reviews.author: Marina Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The comfort Clark’s shoes always have! But the calf part is a bit big.
customer_reviews.author: Ana C. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove! Thinking about buying a second pair just because.
customer_reviews.author: kristiina corlew

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots but too large around my calf. Fits more like wide calf boots.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Kay  Hackert

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Cheyn Whisk Riding Boot
product_meta.description: The cheyn whisk is a knee high boot with a cute button detail. it comes with the ultimate comfort of cushion soft technology and an ortholite footbed.
